title: # 271 - Sean Patton & ME
description:
Sean Patton joins me in the mancave and we talk about joining bootcamp, weed, Ari Shaffir getting kicked off twitter, drinking stories, hip-hop, and masterbation stories.

Sean will be at the Irvine Improv Feb 1st

For more of Seans tour dates go to www.meseanpatton.com 

 

My wife LeeAnn Kreischer has a podcast called "Wife of the party" that comes out Thursday Feb 1st on iTunes so please subscribe, rate, and review! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

This episode is also brought to you by Shari's Berries & Pro Flowers. Save 20% on any gift over $29 using the offer code "Bert" at www.berries.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order with free shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com  
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
